game.name: Out of Reach: Treasure Royale
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Treasure Royale is a Battle Royale style game in which dozens of pirate crews face each other on the open sea, jungle islands and dark caves. Navigate your ship, bombard enemies, find gear but above all - hunt treasures!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Treasure Royale is a Battle Royale style game in which dozens of pirate crews face each other on the open sea, jungle islands and dark caves. Navigate your ship, bombard enemies, find gear but above all - hunt treasures!

reviewHighlights.text: Out of Reach: Treasure Royale, developed by Space Boat Studios and published by PlayWay S.A., is an ambitious blend of open-sea adventure and battle r...
